attributes.action: make it a legal requirement that all trees be green or geenish in colour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All trees should be legally required to be green, greenish or nearly brown as a matter of urgency. Any other colour is against the laws of nature and should not be allowed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
